author: Special Correspondent
text:
Special Mahasivaratri pujas will be performed for the presiding deities of Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple here all through the night of March 7.

Abishekam will be performed at one-hour intervals for Lord Sundareswarar from 10 p.m. to 1 a.m. and for Goddess Meenakshi from 11 p.m. to 2 a.m. Devotees can deposit puja materials with the temple authorities by the evening of March 7.

To be open throughout night

The temple will remain open throughout the night, according to a press release from N. Natarajan, Executive Officer.
title: Mahasivaratri puja at Meenakshi temple
